articles.content: The union Cabinet is expected to take up as soon as next week a proposal to allow foreign investment in Life Insurance Corporation, to help facilitate the initial public offering of the state-owned i… [+2217 chars]

articles.title: Vistara to coexist with Air India, merger talks on hold: Bhaskar Bhat, Tata SIA Airlines - Economic Times
articles.description: We have to run Vistara efficiently and coexist with Air India like any other airline. We too will grab opportunities and continue to do what we have to do. We cannot get confused in our focus, says Bhaskar Bhat. The Tata Group is giving SIA time to warm up to…
articles.content:
The Tata Group aims to turn Air India around without hurting the operations of Vistara and any talk of an eventual merger of the carriers is premature.

articles.title: Netflix now available on Tata Play (formerly Tata Sky): How to get it - The Indian Express
articles.description: Tata Sky Netflix Plan Offers: Netflix Is Now Available on Tata Play in Combo Packs: Tata Play subscribers can now access content from Netflix, TV Channels, and OTT aggregator app Binge all through a single combination plan.
articles.content: Tata Sky announced its rebranding yesterday to Tata Play. The announcement also mentioned that subscribers of Tata Play will be able to access Netflix via their membership for the Tata Binge+ service… [+2791 chars]
